site.name: AI Ethics Project
site.description: An informal Montreal community group discussing ethical AI development

home.welcome: Welcome to the AI Ethics Project
home.subtitle: A Montreal-based community exploring ethical AI development
home.description: We are an informal, unincorporated group of citizens, researchers, and practitioners interested in the ethical implications of artificial intelligence.
home.disclaimer: Note: This is an informal community group, not a legal entity or registered organization.
